title: Emerald Floral Jhumki - Pachala Puvvu Jumka
features: Classic floral stud design featuring an oval-cut emerald surrounded by CZ stones. A graceful, teardrop-shaped emerald pendant hangs below, also encircled by dazzling CZ. The open setting maximizes light, enhancing the emerald's natural brilliance. Traditional South Indian Jhumka with a modern, lightweight design.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
and other celebrations. Also suitable for evening events and parties.
description: These exquisite Jhumkis combine the timeless elegance of emeralds with the brilliance of CZ, creating a captivating piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and rich appearance. The classic design with modern elements ensures versatility and wearability. A beautiful symbol of prosperity and good fortune.
